page.title: 10Industry and Jobs 1
page.content: The most noticable thing about industry in the area is the lack of it. QUARRYING occurs nearby, but just outside our "block". There was once an iron ore MINE in the locality but the only evidence of this today is the presence of the overgrown spoil heaps. A RAILWAY once served these mines and also provided transport for the local population to visit other areas, but this too is merely an overgrown relic of past activity. Looking to the future,there is a strong liklihood that some of the area will become an open cast COAL mine as the N.C.B. have extensive workings in adjacent areas and are presently surveying parts of this area.This may not be for another ten to fifteen years, but it will change the predominantly rural scene of today.
